title: A Romantic Escape in Country Victoria
description: If you’re planning a relaxing getaway for you and your other half, look no further than the Black Spur Inn in the Yarra Valley. This region is home to fine wines, stunning natural landscapes and picturesque towns, and the Black Spur Inn is the perfect base as you explore all this area has to offer. Includes a bottle of local wine, daily breakfast, entry to Bruno’s Art & Sculpture Garden, an AU$50 meal voucher and guaranteed 12pm late checkout.
